content: Our adjusted cash flow for our bottom line was impacted by an update to our non-GAAP treatment of certain development stage payments, which amounted to $100 million in the quarter. Lastly, after de minimis payments for ongoing development stage funding and other items, this resulted in adjusted cash flow, our bottom line of $367 million or $0.60 per share for the first quarter.
